name: Light Switch (Cragon2409)
description:
Light Switch is a puzzle platformer game where you play as two emotive squares.

Greg is a green square who has an extreme phobia of darkness and odd levitating squares.

Fred is a red square with an abnormal relationship to gravity and a light phobia of light.

Journey through levels to get both Greg and Fred to their exit, and find joy in their adventure.

So enjoy this python programmed experience!

-Samuel Price, Developed for the 2021 GeoGam
